saas.name: Salesforce (Sales Cloud)
saas.pricing_summary: Starts around $25 USD per user/month for entry Sales Cloud editions; enterprise pricing and add-ons vary and often require sales contact.
saas.differentiator: Extensive enterprise CRM ecosystem and deep integrations with broad ISV marketplace.

saas.name: HubSpot
saas.pricing_summary: Free CRM tier available; paid Starter/Professional/Enterprise tiers (examples: Starter ~ $20/user/month; promotional first-year discounts sometimes apply).
saas.differentiator: All-in-one inbound marketing + CRM platform with strong free tier and marketing automation for SMBs.

saas.name: Zendesk
saas.pricing_summary: Agent-based pricing starting from roughly $19–25 USD/agent/month for basic support plans (annual billing); advanced AI and WFM add-ons priced separately.
saas.differentiator: Omnichannel customer support platform with rich ticketing, AI automation and large ecosystem of integrations.

saas.name: Atlassian (Jira / Confluence)
saas.pricing_summary: Free tier for small teams; Standard ~$7.91 per user/month and Premium ~$14.54 per user/month (cloud pricing; varies by region and billing frequency).
saas.differentiator: Developer- and team-centric collaboration tools with strong workflow/customization for engineering teams.

saas.name: Freshworks (Freshdesk / Freshsales)
saas.pricing_summary: Free programs available for small teams; paid plans from roughly $15 per agent/month for helpdesk tiers; product-specific pricing and bundled offers exist.
saas.differentiator: Easy-to-use customer service suites optimized for fast time-to-value and competitive SMB pricing.

healthcare.name: Teladoc Health
healthcare.pricing_summary: Per-visit self-pay options (example: ~USD $89 per visit) and many customers access via employer/insurer plans; subscription & program pricing varies by region and payer.
healthcare.differentiator: Large telehealth network with broad services (primary care, mental health, specialist consults) and payer integrations.

healthcare.name: Babylon Health
healthcare.region: UK, Europe, parts of Asia / Africa
healthcare.pricing_summary: Subscription-based consumer plans (examples: monthly/annual bundles in the UK — tiered plans such as Lite/Monthly/Annual); pricing varies by market and plan.
healthcare.differentiator: AI-driven triage and virtual GP services paired with subscription packages for consumers and partners.

healthcare.name: Practo
healthcare.pricing_summary: Consumer subscription (Practo Plus) and provider (clinic/EMR) plans: consumer plans start around INR 1,199/month (discounted annual options available); clinic management tiers are priced separately.
healthcare.differentiator: India-focused healthcare platform combining patient bookings, teleconsults, records and clinic management in one ecosystem.

healthcare.name: Oracle Health (Cerner)
healthcare.pricing_summary: Enterprise EHR/health IT pricing is custom and typically large-capex/contract-based (published guidance and certified-cost disclosures available; per-user or site licensing models used).
healthcare.differentiator: Large hospital / enterprise-grade EHR with deep clinical workflows and long-established market share (now part of Oracle).

healthcare.name: Philips Healthcare
healthcare.pricing_summary: Medical device and software offerings use capital purchase, service contracts, or subscription (e.g., Enterprise Monitoring-as-a-Service) — pricing is contract/solution-specific.
healthcare.differentiator: Broad portfolio across imaging, monitoring and enterprise informatics with strong hardware+software integration.

fintech.name: Stripe
fintech.pricing_summary: Card processing: typical published rates e.g., domestic cards ~2.7–2.9% + fixed cent-per-transaction depending on country; Connect/Advanced products have additional usage-based fees.
fintech.differentiator: Developer-first payments API with modular products for marketplaces, subscriptions, and global payouts.

fintech.name: Square (Block)
fintech.region: Primarily US, Canada, UK, Australia, Japan
fintech.pricing_summary: Consumer-facing pricing: example in-person card rates ~2.6% + $0.10–$0.15; online rates higher and monthly software tiers (Square Plus etc.) exist (regional variations apply).
fintech.differentiator: Integrated POS hardware + payments + merchant software stack for small businesses and retailers.

fintech.name: PayPal
fintech.pricing_summary: Transaction fees vary by country and payment type (merchant fees, currency conversion fees). For many markets consumer purchases are free; merchant fees are percent + fixed-amount per transaction and differ regionally.
fintech.differentiator: Ubiquitous consumer wallet and checkout experience with strong buyer protections and broad merchant acceptance.

fintech.name: Revolut
fintech.pricing_summary: Tiered consumer plans: Standard (free), Plus (~£3.99/mo), Premium (~£7.99/mo), Metal/Ultra paid tiers with additional benefits; business plans available with monthly fees and FX/transaction limits.
fintech.differentiator: Neobank-style app combining multi-currency accounts, FX, cards and additional fintech services in a single app.

fintech.name: Plaid
fintech.pricing_summary: Developer-focused pricing: pay-as-you-go or subscription models for different products (per-request flat fees, monthly subscriptions or enterprise contracts depending on product & volume).
fintech.differentiator: Bank connectivity and data APIs used widely by fintechs to access account & transaction data securely.
